# Introduction

Hi, My name is Timo Voskuilen. I am a 22 year old life sciences student at the university of applied sciences at the Hogeschool Utrecht. I am specified in biomedical research and thrive to find a career in the oncology. I am currently in the process of becoming a data scientist, I am following a course called Data science for biology at the Hogeschool Utrecht.
